channel.title: Minorities acting like bitches
channel.description: The debate here is whether minorities should have more rights than majorities. This includes almost every country except South Africa where the minorities, whites, pwn everything. Black people are allowed more leeway when insulting a white man than a white man to a black man. Is it fair to say, "you don't feel any suffering from your ancestors."? Also, don't bitch about any one minority for no reason. i.e. "Muslims all think everyone hates them" or whatever. BTW, I'm Indian, not red, but brown. Going to sleep for now.

item.title: Minorities acting like bitches
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

It’s better to just give poor country’s the ability to make their own country better then to let them migrate into other country’s. They are just like people who attempt suicide, their just running away from problems instead of solving them.

They are solving there own problems, by them coming to us they get teh monies!

Read full topic

item.title: Minorities acting like bitches
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:18, topic:152230”]It’s better to just give poor country’s the ability to make their own country better then to let them migrate into other country’s.[/quote]That may be close to the stupidest thing I’ve ever heard. When you take away from country A to benefit country B, what is left of country A? And then imagine what comes next! Once B has sucked A dry, it all comes back to A! Condoning something like that also promotes keeping the entire world in limbo.[quote=“Mopman, post:13, topic:152230”]If you really don’t want to segregate people, you could stop referring to them as fuckin’ “minorities” for a start. Some guy up ^ there (sorry forgot who it was) even said “I’m a minority”. You’re a human being, I’m a human being, Silver Lining isn’t, but he get’s away with it.[/quote]I do not recall giving you permission to openly speak of that information regarding my race. HOWEVER, I completely agree that thinking of someone as a separate race while speaking out against racism is idiotic, which I believe you said, unless my interpretive skills are failing me?
[center] [/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Minorities acting like bitches
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:16, topic:152230”][quote author=killerman93 link=topic=208218.msg1829382#msg1829382 date=1192742616]
In the UK we got people from all over the EU allowed in just because there from Europe, plus theyre intitled to our aid and our NHS. But guess what? If you come from anywhere else, you gotta get a visa/nationality.
[/quote]

Which is a benefit, in my opinion, because it means I can goto France/Germany/Austria etc. and work, if the mood strikes me.[/quote]

And it’s also a loss to you because the government has to tax more money to pay the EU fees.

In any case, if you want something to rant about, turn to migrants and asylum seekers, the migrants is obvious and asylum seekers should be going to country’s closer to them such as France.

Read full topic

item.title: Minorities acting like bitches
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

If you really don’t want to segregate people, you could stop referring to them as fuckin’ “minorities” for a start. Some guy up ^ there (sorry forgot who it was) even said “I’m a minority”. You’re a human being, I’m a human being, Silver Lining isn’t, but he get’s away with it.

Stop with the “minority”, “omgz multicultural” crap and perhaps some of the other shit will stop with it.

Read full topic
